main.name: Arcy Flores
main.description: I'm passionate about building great front-end user interfaces and experimenting with data science using Python.
main.bio: Straight out of undergrad I thought I would give Real Estate a shot but struggled to find my footing and found myself spending more hours fiddling with my website than selling homes. I had created a simple static site on Weebly but configuring various widgets, styling the site, and adding images, had me remniscing on my MySpace days when I spent hours copying and pasting code snippets to customize my page. After some time I decided to put a hold on my 'Million Dollar Listing' career and ended up diving deeper into learning how to code. Eventually my research led me to enrolling in a Computer Science Master's program and after landing an internship with Cisco, where I had the opporunity to work on several exciting projects. Now I'm

education.description: Took a range of classes including Object Oriented Programming, Data Mining, Web Development, and Database Management Systems.

Partook in various Latinx Organizations in which we showcased the Latinx experience in Los Angeles through student written plays, volunteered at the UCLA Ronald Reagan Medical Center, and focused on Social Psychology classes.

work.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
work.description: Working on an Agile team to add new features to existing applications as requsted by business to better serve our users using Angular 8, Spring, and Apache Struts.

work.title: Software Engineer Co-op
work.description: Collaborated with Customer Experience Product Management team to develop a web application for two of the largest service providers in America to assist in modernizing their network, estimated 2 billion dollars in revenue.
